title: Strengthening Learning Design Practical Competencies: Veterinary Case-Based Collaborative Learning Design: Team-Based Learning (TBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can identify key issues in veterinary clinical cases with over 80% accuracy through team-based discussions.
Learners can derive effective solutions by applying seven group collaboration patterns in case-based collaborative learning.
Learners can recognize and correct three or more cognitive biases in their veterinary case analysis process based on peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
